entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APK cannot install on Android 13 #28067
  • ScrollView TapGestureRecognizer - taping background doesn't fire Tapped event #28064
  • Allow use of new WebView2CompositionControl for WPF BlazorWebView #28063
    Backlog
  • Not showing ,net maui templates #28057
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid App Stuck on White Screen with WebKit Networking Errors on iOS #28052
  • ViewExtensions.OnUnloaded causes app crash if the view is already disposed, this happens for web view in Blazor Hybrid apps #28051
  • .NET MAUI Multi-Project App's WinUI project has incorrect runtime identifiers #28047
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Flyout text dissappears after locking the screen #23214
    Backlog
  • Changing FlyoutItem Title causes Title to disappear #15827
    Backlog
  • Built in MVU architecture support #28062
  • [Android] Animation lag when we use framework TranslateTo() method. #10789
  • [Windows] Flyout Shell Content title is not broken over multiple lines. #15017
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object: Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.NavigationRenderer.SetStatusBarStyle() at Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.NavigationRenderer.ViewWillAppear(Boolean animated) #27069
  • Issue on Windows - Exception thrown: 'System.NullReferenceException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #26498
    Backlog
  • Make `ShadowTypeConverter` public and enabled nullable references `﻿#nullable enable` #27737
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Compiled code binding isn't intercepted #26616
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the performance of provisioning and running of device tests #28065
  • Fix bug in sample data template TextValidationBehavior flag #28061
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make more internal methods public #28059
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling UITest Stepper actions for Maccatalyst #28055
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] TabbedPage.AutoResizeIconsProperty #28046
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix for issues caused by setting Shell.FlyoutWidth on WinUI when binding context values are changed #27151
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed NRE when clearing ListView after navigating back #27274
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • add DebuggerTypeProxy for Shell #27989
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Run provisionator devdiv #28056
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28045
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public & nullable for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [BindingSG] Added Binding.Create support for xaml generated sources #27610
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml, delighter-sc
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #27502
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [code style] Prefer file-scope namespaces #28040
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #27970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Android - Essentials Geolocation | Added support for MslAltitudeMeters #27579
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the shape rendering issue when the IsVisible property changes #28002
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView throws NRE when value of IsGrouped property is changed to false #27331
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for TabbedPage more menu items color. #26876
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed [Android] ListView scroll position maintains after items refresh #26723
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the ListView SelectedItem not cleared after the list is cleared #26712
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed the SwipeView items were not displayed properly #27399
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26217
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #26194
    community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion
  • Able to cancel WebAuthenticator.AuthenticateAsync programmatically using a CancellationToken #26137 #26180
    area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-webauth, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker focus events #27973
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
